description: Naruse Kozue is first shown to be a http://anidb.net/ch18063 [Ami]`s friend and classmate at the http://anidb.net/ch20888 [Academy]. She is deeply embracing of the occult, shown through her endeavors to prove to http://anidb.net/ch18062 [Maya] that the occult is very real as well as agreeing to go through a near death experience for a class demonstration. Kozue is portrayed as a being very clumsy, often being the first to fall victim to demons.
name: Naruse Kozue
